__e: If this reaches you and you need more leave word at my office.
- Yeah. If it gets here and I'm not here, could you sign for it and put it in?
We rushed home early so we could get a few moments of peace before your mother gets here and makes my life a living...
- A while back, Dick, Barry and I agreed.... - Just before I moved here. that what really matters is what you like... not what you are like.
Because what matters is that I believe it, or rather, no not that I believe it, but that I believe it.
I guess what it comes down to is maybe you really do only get one shot.
